nodes.text: A Targeting Assistance Mem-Stik was a modified memory module rigged to plug into a datapad to provide combat assistance. When this mem-stik was used, it provided its user with a continuous update on hostile target positions.
In 1 ABY Colonel Quarsh Panaka gave a Targeting Assistance Mem-Stik to a spacer that helped him in his investigations of the criminal Skaak Tippers.
